caller_intent: Marion is seeking liability insurance for a vehicle and is looking for assistance from an insurance provider.
resolution_steps: Agent Jeremy Colin confirms Marion's intent to obtain liability insurance.
Asks Marion about his current insurance provider (none).
Informs Marion that Alliance Insurance does not have carriers available for this type of insurance.
Provides a phone number to a different agency that can assist with this request.
Requests Marion to contact the referred agency and shares the number (336-768-2107).
knowledge_required: Understanding of available insurance carriers and their current capacity to take on new clients.
Ability to identify appropriate referral partners for specific insurance needs.
summary: Jeremy Colin from Alliance Insurance Services informs Marion that they cannot provide liability insurance for a vehicle due to carrier limitations and refers him to another agency. The call concludes with the provision of a referral phone number.
